column5: I wanted to take a moment to say thanks to all the hydro workers, many of whom I suspect will work through Christmas day so others can get their power back, and a few of whom I suspect are members here. And while I'm here - Merry Christmas to all - may you receive health, happiness, and good fortune this holiday season
If you see a crew working, a Timmies goes a long way.

They showed on the news about 40 hydro workers from Manitoba boarded a plane on their own time and are heading to Toronto over the Xmas break to help restore the hardest hit areas !!!! Also crews Comming from Michigan and Quebec and New York State !!!!! Cheers to them that's amazing to give up time with their own families to come help others !!!!! Great news

They showed on the news about 40 hydro workers from Manitoba boarded a plane on their own time and are heading to Toronto over the Xmas break to help restore the hardest hit areas !!!! Also crews Comming from Michigan and Quebec and New York State !!!!! Cheers to them that's amazing to give up time with their own families to come help others !!!!! Great news
Yup, that's pretty darned nice of all those guys to give up their Christmas to help others
If you see them today, I'm sure the coffee would be appreciated, as well as perhaps something more substantial if you have it. Not a lot of places to buy a snack or a meal on Christmas day.
